analysis: The current project has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The theme needs to be updated to focus on black holes, with animated objects and slides. The CSS file should include cosmic-themed colors, animations, and SVG patterns related to black holes. The JavaScript file should handle the animation and interaction of these elements.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file to include cosmic-themed colors, animations, and SVG patterns related to black holes. Add animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.

Update the JavaScript file to handle the animation and interaction of black hole-themed elements, including animated objects and slides. Ensure all event handlers and functionality are properly implemented.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive black hole visuals, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
